title: Environmental leadership : a reference handbook
subject: Environmental management$$QEnvironmental management -- Handbooks, manuals, etc

Conservation leadership
Environmental management
format: 1 online resource (2 volumes (xxxvii, 972 pages)) : illustrations, maps
publisher: Thousand Oaks, California : SAGE Publications, Inc.
description: This reference handbook tackles issues relevant to leadership in the realm of the environment and sustainability.
contributor: Gallagher, Deborah Rigling, editor.$$QGallagher, Deborah Rigling
contents: v. 1. Perspectives on environmental leadership -- v. 2. Environmental leadership challenges.

[v. 1.] Why environmental leadership? / Deborah Rigling Gallagher -- Environmental leadership as a practice / Norman L. Christensen Jr. -- History of environmental leadership / Richard N.L. Andrews -- Building environmental leadership with faith communities / Mallory McDuff -- Leading to heal : a view of sustainability leadership / Abeer Abdel Hamid Salem -- Environmental sustainability : how mind-sets shape agendas / Sue Williams and Sharon Turnbull -- The color of climate : ecology, environment, climate change, and women of color : exploring environmental leadership from the perspective of women of color in science / Gillian Bowser, Nina S. Roberts, Denise R. Simmons, M. Kathleen Perales -- Academia, advocacy, and activism : toward a scholarship of engagement for environmental leaders / Andrew George -- Religious and environmental leadership / Corné J. Bekker -- Naturalists as environmental leaders : bringing natural history from the past and into the future / Nicolette L. Cagle -- The environmental leadership of Theodore Roosevelt / Benjamin W. Redekop -- Environmental leadership through the diffusion of pioneering policy / Katja Biedenkopf -- Leading by procuring : the power of public sector purchasing / Adrian Morley, Roberta Sonnino, and Alastair Smith -- Environmental leadership and stewardship in the U.S. military / William W. Doe III -- Environmental management in a developing country : a case study of Israel / Uri Marinov and Mordechai Shechter -- Government initiatives to provide leadership in environmental management : the Singapore experience / Leo Tan Wee Hin, R. Subramaniam -- The nature and role of agency leadership : building and sustaining collaboration in natural resource management and environmental policy decision making / Gregg B. Walker, Steven E. Daniels -- Fostering employee proenvironmental behavior : the role of leadership and motivation / Laura M. Graves and Joseph Sarkis -- Ecopreneurial leaders and transformational leadership / Curt A. Gilstrap and Cristina M. Gilstrap -- An external approach to green product innovation / Natalia Ortiz-de-Mandojana, Javier Aguilera-Caracuel, Vera Ferrón-Vílchez, and José Manuel de la Torre-Ruiz -- Interface's approach to sustainability leadership / Wendy Stubbs -- A better kind of climate change : establishing a culture of sustainability in organizations / Matt Fox -- Environmental leaders in the private sector : going beyond conventional behavior / Ambra Galeazzo, Alessandra Tognazzo, and Valentina de Marchi -- Taking corporate social responsibility to the next level / Gavin Edwards -- Environmental leadership and deliberative democracy : the challenges and promise of engagement / Timothy J. Shaffer -- The resilience and power of heterarchical leadership / L. Steven Smutko, Mary Lou Addor -- The Nicholas Institute : bringing academia into a leadership position for environmental policy / Tim Profeta and Lydia Olander -- Environmental nongovernmental organization coalitions : how the Green 10 influences European Union institutions / Javier Delgado-Ceballos, Deborah de Lange, Samuel Gómez-Haro, María Dolores Vidal-Salazar -- Citizen professionals : the effective practices of helping community organizations / Sarah Hippensteel Hall, Richard A. Couto -- Beyond environmental leadership to restorative leadership : an emerging framework for cultivating resilient communities in the 21st century / Seana Lowe Steffen -- Autonomous and pragmatic governance networks : environmental leadership and strategies of local voluntary and community sector organizations in the United Kingdom / Andrew P. Kythreotis -- Collaboration in the face of fast-track permitting in Texas / Valerie Thatcher -- The localism movement : environmental leadership in grassroots activism / Nancy B. Kurland, Sara Jane McCaffrey, Deone Zell -- The community capitals framework : a systemic approach to environmental leadership / Timothy Collins, Cornelia Butler Flora -- Environmental justice from the ground up / Becca Berkey -- Moving from stakeholders to citizen leadership / Jill B. Jacoby -- The use of social media in response to the Gulf of Mexico BP oil spill / Claire Menck -- Spokesperson for the planet : environmental leadership and Yann Arthus-Bertrand's home / Jeffrey L. Courtright and Peter M. Smudde -- Digital environmentalism : tools and strategies for the evolving online ecosystem / Andrew David Thaler, Kevin A. Zelnio, Amy Freitag, Rick MacPherson, David Shiffman, Holly Bik, Miriam C. Goldstein, Craig McClain -- Ecomusicology : bridging the sciences, arts, and humanities / Aaron S. Allen -- Environmental journalism revisited / Alan K. Betts, Elizabeth Gibson -- The Talloires declaration : global networking and local action / Janna L. Rose -- Education for regional nonprofit environmental leadership / T.K. Rossiter -- Television weathercasters as environmental science communicators / Sara Espinoza, Ann Posegate, Katherine Rowan, Kristopher Wilson, Xiaoquan Zhao, Edward Maibach -- Interdisciplinary environmental leadership : learning and teaching integrated problem solving / Susan G. Clark, Richard L. Wallace -- Ethics, leadership, and the principles for responsible management education (PRME) : sustainability matters / Jessica McManus Warnell and Theresa Ricke-Kiely -- Leadership in environmental education : Evergreen's brick works / Ann Armstrong -- Intersectoral environmental leadership training : a view from the field / Jeremy Benstein -- Environmental leadership through campus project teams : green structures for linking students, faculty, and staff / David Whiteman and Meredith C.F. Powers.

[v. 2.] Sustainability leadership as 21st-century leadership / Mike Shriberg -- Native leadership and adaptation to climate change : a case study / Mary Emery, Meredith Redlin, Wendy Young -- Green Boston Harbor (GBH) project / Anamarija Frankic, Lisa Greber, Chris McIntyre, and Seth Sheldon -- Leadership in response to extreme flood events in Hungary / Elizabeth A. Albright -- Confronting climate change : leadership and action in the face of scientific uncertainty / Sarah F. Trainor -- Restoring ecosystem services in riparian zones by promoting working forests in São Paulo, Brazil / Norton Ribeiro de Freitas Jr. and Joshua Farley -- Managing for climate risk / Timo Busch, Stephanie G. Berger, Raymond Paquin -- Fostering legitimacy in agro-environmental governance : the case of the Danish green growth strategy for combating eutrophication in the Baltic Sea Region / Rasmus Klocker Larsen and Neil Powell -- Securitizing climate change : the United Nations Security Council debate / Christian Webersik -- The inherent conflict between sound environmental stewardship and political leadership in the developing world : a case study of Trinidad and Tobago / Rajendra Ramlogan, Natalie Persadie -- Environmental leaders as strategists skilled in working the law- and policy-making systems : lessons from China, India, the United States, and the United Nations / Paul A. Barresi -- Halting the decline : how leadership theory and practice can address global biodiversity loss / Rian Satterwhite -- Leadership capacity in transboundary river basins : institutions and individuals / Nicole Kranz, Inga Jacobs -- California climate action / Jan Mazurek -- Leadership in project financing : environmental safeguards and the World Bank / Estela Neves, Flavia Cavazotte -- Spanish hotel industry leadership in climate change mitigation / Vera Ferrón-Vílchez, José Manuel de la Torre-Ruiz, Natalia Ortiz-de-Mandojana, and Javier Aguilera-Caracuel -- Sustainable gastronomy : a market-based strategy for improving environmental sustainability in the Peruvian anchoveta fishery / Kristin Wintersteen -- Tackling information problems in agrifood governance : the role of eco-labels and third-party certification schemes / Shana M. Starobin -- Environmental leadership in Italy : the example of fast train line development / Fabrizio D'Aprile and Nigel Tapper -- Aeroponics : experiences from Singapore on a green technology for urban farming / R. Subramaniam, Lee Sing Kong -- Urban agriculture in the face of disaster and environmental change / Claire Menck -- The shared leadership and ownership of our private forests : insights from forest landowners' personal networks / Tatyana B. Ruseva, Burnell C. Fischer -- Wind power in Oklahoma / Mark Meo -- Redefining leadership and sustainability the network way : building institutional networks for environmental education for the National Park Service / Elizabeth Davis, Kathryn Newcomer, Katherine Hanson, Charity Self -- Environmental leadership in waste management : experiences from Singapore / Leo Tan Wee Hin, R. Subramaniam -- Moving upstream : collaborative leadership in water quality improvement / Sarah Hippensteel Hall, Richard A. Couto -- Product innovation / Preeta M. Banerjee -- Sustainability in suburbia / Robert Brinkmann -- Environmental leadership through public procurement? The Swedish experience / Carl Dalhammar and Luis Mundaca -- The significance of individual leadership in complex governance arenas : the case of transportation and climate change / Karen Anderton, Kate Pangbourne -- Leadership for sustainable food systems / Paul Kaak -- Embracing complexity to enable change / Mehreen Faruqi -- A toxic issue? Leadership in comprehensive chemicals management / Katja Biedenkopf, Dae Young Park -- Characteristics of the formalized environmental justice movement : implications for environmental governance / Sheila M. Huss, Paul B. Stretesky, Michael J. Lynch -- Beyond knowledge and information : making sense of local management / Seema Arora-Jonsson -- Leading questions / Julianne Lutz Warren -- Exploring leadership pathways in global environmental health and social justice : a geospatial perspective / Florence M. Margai -- Developing policy responses to address environmental migration in Asia and the Pacific / François Gemenne and Pauline Brücker -- Environmental migration / Graeme Hugo -- Transforming collaboration : the role of leadership qualities in managing environmental justice conflicts / Sarah E. Lashley -- Champions of change : emergent environmental leaders / André C. Taylor -- Leading for the future / Stephanie G. Berger -- Creating the global leader and global mind-set : engaging multicultural students in multidimensional learning / Elizabeth Davis, Gillian Bowser, Mark Brown -- Getting real about it : meeting the psychological and social demands of a world in distress / Susanne C. Moser -- The unique leadership role of GLISTEN undergraduate stewardship liaisons : recruiting, orienting, and training the next generation of Great Lakes ecosystem stewards / Glenn Clayton Odenbrett.
